products.name: Espresso
products.description: A concentrated coffee brewed by forcing hot water through finely-ground coffee beans.

products.name: Cappuccino
products.description: A coffee drink made with espresso, steamed milk, and a layer of frothy milk foam.

products.name: Latte
products.description: A coffee drink made with espresso and steamed milk, usually topped with a small amount of frothed milk.

products.name: Mocha
products.description: A chocolate-flavored variant of a latte, made with espresso, steamed milk, and chocolate syrup.

products.name: Iced Coffee
products.description: Chilled coffee served over ice, often with milk and sweeteners.

products.name: Orange Juice
products.description: Freshly squeezed orange juice, rich in vitamin C.

products.name: Apple Juice
products.description: Sweet and refreshing apple juice made from ripe apples.

products.name: Grapefruit Juice
products.description: Tangy and invigorating juice made from fresh grapefruits.

products.name: Pineapple Juice
products.description: Exotic and tropical juice made from ripe pineapples.

products.name: Mango Juice
products.description: Sweet and luscious juice made from ripe mangoes.

products.name: Cola
products.description: Classic cola soda with a perfect blend of sweetness and fizziness.

products.name: Lemon-Lime Soda
products.description: Refreshing lemon-lime soda, perfect for hot days.

products.name: Orange Soda
products.description: Fruity and delightful orange soda with a burst of citrus flavor.

products.name: Root Beer
products.description: Creamy and smooth root beer, a timeless classic.

products.name: Ginger Ale
products.description: Sparkling and soothing ginger ale, perfect for any occasion.

products.name: Blueberry Muffin
products.description: A moist and delicious muffin filled with blueberries.

products.name: Chocolate Chip Cookie
products.description: A classic cookie filled with chocolate chips.

products.name: Banana Bread
products.description: Delicious and moist banana bread made with ripe bananas.

products.name: Cinnamon Roll
products.description: Soft and fluffy roll with sweet cinnamon filling and icing on top.

products.name: Croissant
products.description: A buttery, flaky pastry that originated in France.

products.name: Apple
products.description: Fresh and juicy apple, a classic and healthy snack.

products.name: Banana
products.description: Sweet and creamy banana, perfect for a quick energy boost.

products.description: Juicy and citrusy orange, packed with vitamin C.

products.name: Grapes

products.name: Watermelon

products.name: Chocolate Brownie
